title: ML-powered App
description: This is React and Node project. After client uses the microphpone to record a piece of audio, @Xenova/transformer is brought in to transcribe the audio to text then translate to certain language.

title: Admin Dashboard App
description: This is a project developed by NextJs and MongoDB, backed by Auth0 to authorize and authenticate admin and client to access different resources. Try it with username:'test1', password:'1234'
